user.title: Add Wasp in a Box
user.description: Create an occupancy sensor that handles periods of no motion.

data_description.wasp_id: Select the motion sensor for the room.
data_description.box_id: Select the door sensor for the room.
data_description.delay:
Set the delay (in seconds) after the door is closed before determining if the room is occupied. If motion is detected when the delay expires, the helper turns to occupied.
Should be set to about 10 seconds above how long your motion sensor stays active after motion is detected.
